channel.title: Changing ip on 317 client
channel.description: hey i just made a 317 server i tried changing the ip through client.java it worked but then when people try to log in it doesnt work when they go through client but it works when they go through a web client like pkclient. I need help please. Do i just have to change the ip on the client or do i have to do sumthing completely diffrent. I already portforwarded and everything and made the server ip on no-ip.com. I already changed the ip still dont work for my mates

item.title: Changing ip on 317 client
item.dc:creator: @Imrodude01 Imrodude01
item.description:
@Imrodude01 wrote:

hmm do you have msn so you might want to check prob out on that its complicated.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing ip on 317 client
item.dc:creator: @Tasered Tasered
item.description:
@Tasered wrote:

If the port is the same, and you port forwarded then you are fine. Just change the IP on the client.

Read full topic
